name: E.R. (2024) Francia Podium
additionalNotes:
Numbered varnished slide lid box of 10 cigars (4,000 produced)
A 2024 release. Released mid-2024
Commemorates the 2024 Summer Olympic Games in Paris. The bundle of cigars is wrapped in aa unique red, white, and blue ribbon.
